Package net.abi.abisEngine.rendering.mesh

Class Mesh

java.lang.Object
net.abi.abisEngine.rendering.mesh.Mesh
All Implemented Interfaces:
AssetI, Expendable
public class Mesh
extends java.lang.Object
implements AssetI
Author:
abinash

  • Nested Class Summary

    Nested Classes 
    Modifier and Type Class Description
    (package private) class  Mesh.MeshData
    Contains the Model Data and the name and Materials that are used on this mesh.
    (package private) class  Mesh.MeshResource
    Contains the reference count to the mesh along with the size of the indices and VAOID and MeshData.
    (package private) class  Mesh.VAO
    Contains the VAOID ID and VBO Buffer ID's for the mesh.

  • Constructor Details

    • Mesh

      public Mesh​(java.lang.String name, Model model, long context_handle, Material initialMaterial)
      Parameters:
      name - The name of the file or the models name in the file.
      model -
      context_handle - The handle of the context this is being bound to.
      initialMaterial - The Material this mesh will start off with, more can be added after construction. If this is null then the material will be set to the default material of the engine.

    • bindModel

      public Mesh bindModel​(int draw_usage)
      Adds the index model to open GL using the draw_option.
      Parameters:
      draw_usage - This hints the GL Implementation on how the data provided will be used.
